headline: Hilton Earns Top Recognition in Condé Nast Traveler’s 2025 Readers’ Choice Awards from U.S. and U.K. Readers
summary: MCLEAN, Va., October 10, 2025--As a global leader in hospitality, Hilton (NYSE: HLT) releases the results of the Condé Nast Traveler Readers’ Choice Awards, spotlighting 47 properties within its brand portfolio that have been recognized by Condé Nast Traveler readers in both U.S. and U.K. markets. This recognition reflects Hilton’s ongoing commitment to delivering world-class experiences across the globe, with hotels and resorts from Waldorf Astoria Hotels & Resorts, Conrad Hotels & Resorts, LXR
